entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Chesterfield

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
